original_instruction: Help me change the 2 in "H2O" to a subscript.
new_task_description: Change the font color of the '2' in 'H2O' to blue.

refined_task_descriptions_by_step.0: Change the font color of the '2' in 'H2O' to blue.

progress_summary: The agent opened the document in LibreOffice Writer and located the title containing "H2O—SOAK UP THE SCIENCE." They attempted to select only the "2" in "H2O" by clicking and double-clicking, but initially selected the whole word. Finally, they positioned the cursor after the "2" and used Shift+Left arrow to select just that character.
generated_task_description_from_vllm: Format the title "H2O—SOAK UP THE SCIENCE" by changing the font color of "H2O" to red and adjusting the font size to 10 pt.

verification.explanation: The font size of 'H2O' is changed to 10 pt, but the font color is not changed to red as required.
